property.name: nifi.registry.port
property.description: HTTP port NiFi Registry runs on when SSL is not enabled

property.name: nifi.registry.port.ssl
property.description: HTTPS port NiFi Registry runs on when SSL is enabled

property.name: nifi.registry.initial_mem
property.description: Initial memory allocation for NiFi Registry JVM (Xms)

property.name: nifi.registry.max_mem
property.description: Max memory allocation for NiFi Registry JVM (Xmx)

property.name: nifi.registry.internal.dir
property.description: Internal directory for NiFi Registry (used to store database and other data). This directory will be created (if not already existing)

property.name: nifi.registry.config.dir
property.description: The directory to store config files (nifi-registry.properties, bootstrap.conf etc). This directory will be created (if not already existing)

property.name: nifi.registry.internal.config.dir
property.description: The directory to store files such as users.xml and authorizations.xml. This directory will be created (if not already existing)

property.name: nifi.registry.database.dir
property.description: The directory for the H2 database. The H2 database keeps track of all items stored in the registry. This directory will be created (if not already existing)

property.name: nifi.registry.security.encrypt.configuration.password
property.description: This password is used to generate the master key for encryption of sensitive properties in nifi-registry.properties file when written to disk. Password needs to at least be 12 characters.
